text: Collect and document problem reports on ULC-supported software tools; document problem resolution.
Archival management software is kept updated to the most current stable release.
Run a pilot and collect feedback on recommendations and requirements for a Centrally-Supported Institutional Repository.

Produce recommendations of cataloging best practices for Open Educational Resources (OER) metadata standards; survey institutions one year later to determine whether they have implemented the recommendations.
Successful ingest of 50,000 items, live on the DPLA website.
